titles.title: A bill for the relief of Joseph Keusch.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Introduced. Directs that a named individual continue to be classified a nonimmigrant alien under the Immigration and Nationality Act and be permitted to remain in the United States until a specified date.
